segments.text: Hello , I'm sorry for calling this late . May I speak to Peter ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry . He's not in right now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He should be back in ten minutes . Could 1 you call back later ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll call again in thirty minutes .
segments.speaker: S1
